translations.bg: за да прескочите, т.е. да върнете
translations.da: for at springe over, dvs. returnere
translations.el: για να παραλείψετε, δηλαδή να επιστρέψετε
translations.fr: pour passer à autre chose, c'est-à-dire renvoyer
translations.nb: for å hoppe over, dvs. returnere
translations.nl: over te slaan, d.w.z. terug te keren
translations.ro: pentru a sări peste, adică pentru a reveni
translations.tr: atlamak için, yani geri dönmek için
